Belgium: Mary of Hungary appointed regent over the Habsburg Netherlands.
Brazil: Bertrand d'Ornesan tries to establish a French trading post at Pernambuco.
Malta: The Knights stage their first attacks from their new naval base in Malta, forming part of a Christian fleet under the command of Admiral Andrea Doria in attacks on the Turks at Modone, on the Ottoman fort at Coronna and, in 1535, on Tunis.
Sweden: Third Dalecarlian Rebellion, also known as the Bell Rebellion (Klockupproret) begins; suppressed two years later
